Contains an item collection with stat bonis to help your colonists on their menial everyday tasks.
[h1]Content[/h1]
Around 18 items and a workbench, which includes recipes by supported mods. All tools are automatically categorized by patch and findable under [i]Weapons Tools[/i] in the storage. Your technological stage matters (Skill too).
- Crafting Table with all crossover mod recipes - Traders only: Interstellar Encyclopedia, How To, Coupon Book, Flowers - Forged #1: Screwdriver, Sickle, Scissors, Whistle - Forged #2: Chef's Knife, Skinning Knife, Saw, Spade - Tailored: Pillow - Crafted: Lash, Fan (early) - Mechanics: Power Drill, Skill Saw - Fabricated: Laptop, Smartphone (late)
[h1]Tools[/h1]
This mod introduces several useful tools for your pawns to craft, trade and utilize. They help out with some of the menial tasks your pawns are going to face - construction, plantwork, animals or even research. Most additions are available early on, a few goodies though, are only available on the market, so keep an eye out for them.
- Interstellar Encyclopedia [i](+33% ResearchSpeed)[/i] - Coupon Book [i](+25% Bargains)[/i] - How To [i](+33% Learning)[/i] - Laptop [i](+25% Research, +10% Learning)[/i] - Smartphone [i](+20% Workspeed, +10% Learning, -25% Stealth)[/i] - Skill Saw [i](2x Treefelling, -25% Yield, Fast, AP)[/i] - Power Drill [i](+33% Constructions, +50% Efficiency, AP)[/i] - Screwdriver [i](+25% Repair, +10% Workspeed)[/i] - Scissors [i](+33% Tailoring)[/i] - Whistle [i](+50% Training)[/i] - Lash [i](+50% Taming, +5 Mood)[/i] - Foxtail [i](+33% Treefelling, +10% Workspeed)[/i] - Chef's Knife [i](+33% Cooking, -20% Food Poison, +10% Butchery)[/i] - Skinning Knife [i](+33% Animals, +20% Yield, +10% Butchery)[/i] - Sickle [i](+33% Harvest)[/i] - Spade [i](+15% Mining, +15% Plants)[/i] - Bouquet [i](+30% Social Impact, +10% Recruitment)[/i] - Pillow [i](-5% Mental Breakdowns, -%25 Sleep)[/i] - Fan [i](+10 Cooling)[/i]
Remember tools are weapons. They're sharp and heavy. Even a pillow can kill someone with enough effort.
[h1]Patches[/h1]
[code] - Vanilla Weapons Expanded [i](Workbench, Recategorization, Whip: +5 Mood)[/i] - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1851407975]Medieval Madness[/url] [i](Workbench, Recategorization, Tweaks)[/i] - Dead Goat's Weapon Pack [i](Deadman's Scythe +25% Plants, +10% Yield)[/i] - Dead Goat's Weapon Pack [i](Butcher's Cleaver: +33% Butchering, +10% Cooking)[/i] - Right Tool Rebalanced [i](Adjustments and Recategorization)[/i] - [XND] Survival Tools [i](Recategorization)[/i][/code]
Patches in handy stats on "Cleaver" and Scythe" when DGWP is installed or takes care of your tool organization. Ancients ruins can have tools inside. New colonies get some extras.
[h1]Compatibility and Loadorder[/h1]
Load Gimmicks late in the list, especially behind listed or similiar mods.
[code] - Multiplayer - Combat Extended (CE) - Dual Wield [i](Butcher's Cleaver + Chef's Knife for your cook)[/i] - EdB Prepare Carefully [i](Choose your tools to start with)[/i] - Vanilla Weapons Expanded ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1814383360]Link[/url]) - Dead Goat's Weapon Pack - Right Tool: Rebalanced ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1702013658]Link[/url]) - Surival Tools ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1566269698]Link[/url]) - Gimmicks - load it here -[/code]
Your scientist grows already grey hair? [i]Take your choice and fix that.[/i]
